title: [CredManager] Provide a way to save credentials when using the Import feature
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
***At this time, this issue only applies to the `reapply_credential_manager` branch.***
Related to #208

When I am importing connections, I should be shown the credentials harvested from the imported file so I can choose where to save them.

The solution should have the following qualities:
- When importing connections from any format (.csv, .rdg, etc), a screen should be shown to the user that displays the credentials found during the import.

comments.author: kmscode

comments.snippet:
> 1 credential record that is used by all 5 hosts

This is correct. Each connection info is assigned a credential id that ties it to a single credential record. The actual credential information is pulled from the credential service when it is needed (for display, start a connection, external tool args, etc).
